nodes.text: The INT-66 was a heavy gunship/interceptor produced by Corellian Engineering Corporation.

A heavy interceptor, the INT-66 was used by some independent systems for systems patrol and defense operations; private ownership of a INT-66 outside of the military was rare, though some individuals, such as licensed bounty hunters and other qualified individuals could obtain one.

While heavy interceptors as a whole were generally under-powered engine wise, their superior weapon and shield systems made them impressive gunships. Despite this, it wasn't uncommon to upgrade their engine systems for better output and maneuverability.
The Gorgon was an INT-66 whose engines had been upgraded from stock configuration by its owner, Daxtorn Lethos.
